title: Are rappers trying to promote drugs? If so, why? Does this have an effect on the current generation growing up with rap music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think it definitely has an effect on today’s youth, as so many are very impressionable. But that’s not to say that all kids who listen to rap are going to be drug addicts. Again, it all comes back to money. As rapper Future (One of the most known “drug talk” rappers) has said in recent interviews, he talks about how he himself doesn’t even do many drugs, but it is what people and the industry want to hear in this era. Cater to the fans, make more money.
